data.title: Contact us
data.meta_description: Contact us: comprehensive contact information across Enbridge's operations
data.text:
At Enbridge, we believe that energy enables people to live their lives to the fullest. And for nearly 75 years, Enbridge has become a North American leader in energy delivery by connecting people to the energy they need—safely and responsibly.

Enbridge employs more than 12,000 people, primarily across the U.S. and Canada. We've been selected to Bloomberg’s Gender Equality Index five years running, most recently in 2023, and we have been ranked among Canada’s Top 100 Employers 20 times, most recently in 2023.

Please use this link to be taken directly to our company-wide list of emergency contacts.

Otherwise, please contact us using the information below.

Contact information for community members

If you would like to be considered by Enbridge for an investment or sponsorship opportunity, please review the qualifications that pertain to your country.

Our online application form will guide you through the questions you need to answer in order for us to make a decision. To prepare in advance, please read the instructions before applying. When you are ready, please complete the application form.

Decisions are normally made within six weeks of receipt of a complete application, however, decisions on major funding requests may take longer.

Organizations receiving funding may be asked to provide a final report detailing the results and benefits achieved through the funded project, program or campaign.

Info and contacts for landowners

Click here to contact us

Call or click before you dig

Before digging on or near any pipeline right-of-way, call your local one-call center or 8-1-1 in the United States, and visit ClickBeforeYouDig.com in Canada.

Crossings

Got questions about crossing a pipeline or facility, working on or within 30 m (100 feet) of our pipeline right-of-way, or submitting an application?

In Canada: Call 1-800-668-2951 (option #2), or email CrossingsCanada@enbridge.com

In the U.S.: Call 1-888-217-9110 (option #4), or email CrossingsUS@enbridge.com

Sign up for News Alerts

Account administration – registered shareholders only

Please note, Enbridge does not administer shareholder accounts directly. If you hold your shares through a brokerage firm, please contact them directly. If you are a registered shareholder and you would like to perform an address change, confirmation of holdings, or retrieve statement of accounts, please contact:

Computershare Trust Company of Canada (1-866-276-9479).

General dividend information

Enbridge declares its dividends in Canadian dollars. Our current quarterly dividend per share is $0.9150, or $3.66 dividend per share on an annualized basis for 2024.

Click here for more information.

Dividend withholding taxes (non-Canadian residents)

Registered shareholders should confirm with Computershare Trust Company of Canada that they have submitted the NR301 and W9 forms. Tax treaties generally reduce the rate of Canadian withholding taxes on dividends to 15%.

If you hold your shares through a brokerage firm please contact them directly. Brokerage firms are required to submit these forms on your behalf, Enbridge has no further recourse.

Click here for more information.

Dividend tax forms (1099-DIV)

If you hold your shares a brokerage firm, please contact them directly. If you are a registered shareholder, please contact:

Computershare for your tax form: 1-866-276-9479

AST for your 2018 tax form: 1-800-821-2794

Former EEP/SEP unitholders K1 tax forms, including 2018

Please note: 2018 K1’s were the final K1’s issued for EEP and SEP unitholders. Following the simplification transaction EEP and SEP units were exchanged for Enbridge Inc. shares at the end of 2018. Enbridge Inc. does not issue K1 forms and shareholders will receive a 1099-DIV tax form in place of the K1. For prior tax years, please contact:

Investor.Relations@enbridge.com or 1-800-481-2804

Registrar and Transfer Agent (for Enbridge shareholders)

Toll-free (within North America): 1-866-276-9479

Outside North America: 1-514-982-8696

Shareholder and issuer information is now located on the Computershare Trust Company of Canada website at www.computershare.com/enbridge.

Transfer Agent (for shareholders of Spectra Energy Partners, LP)

American Stock Transfer & Trust Company

Within U.S.: 1-800-937-5449

Outside U.S.: 1-718-921-8124

Investor Relations Management

Rebecca Morley

Vice President, Investor Relations

Telephone within North America 1-800-481-2804 Fax 1-403-231-5780 Mailing Address Enbridge Inc. Investor Relations

200, Fifth Avenue Place

425 - 1st Street S.W.

Calgary, Alberta

Canada T2P 3L8 Email Inquiries investor.relations@enbridge.com
